text: Ok. All apple routers have auto power off/on at sometime during the night.
Night time between midnight and 2am. So it's a staggered minute or two power off.
ok. when we migrate to ubiquiti, the auto reboot will come to an end? or is this the config on the ubiquiti routers?
No need to reboot Ubiquiti APs besides the odd manual upgrade.

Following some discussion with Josh D about TV size for new office, "appropriate" sizes for the TV's are a little smaller than what we specced. Added a question about head movement to Josh @ Ohm to TVs I found.
With 4x 55" TVs for small/medium spaces and 4x 65" TVs for Large conf spaces, we shave off $5300 from original 2x55, 2x 65, 4x75 tvs.
Firewall quote seems good to me. Mostly paying for setup and saving me time learning PFSense, which is something I could probably do given more time/less responsibilities.
yup seems good to me too
